name: THE FUCHSIA OF ART
description: Oh you thought I was only going to do one of those fuchsia puns? Think again my friends, we're back and this time it's THE FUCHSIA OF ART. Making these are some of the most fun I've ever had making artwork. I understand that for some people those of my previous work can be a bit 'heady', but color puns are always an instant hit because of their directness. I can always count on people reacting positively to these works (for the most part). It's a nice feeling to see people smile and giggle. Sometimes art needs to be serious, candid, and/or direct...and sometimes it should be humorous. Reflection is great and all, but we need to relax once in awhile; got to have moderation.
